name: Hanoi Time City Park Hill Apartment
address: Unit 3209, Park 5, Time City, 458 Minh Khai, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set in Hanoi, Hanoi Time City Park Hill Apartment is an apartment boasting an outdoor pool. The air-conditioned unit is 2.2 km from Hanoi Creative City. Free WiFi is offered .

The unit is fitted with a kitchen. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is featured. There is a private bathroom with a shower.

National Museum of Vietnamese History is 3.6 km from Hanoi Time City Park Hill Apartment, while Ba Dinh Square is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 26 km from the property.
